Groups and Events by Gordon Ramsay
Whether you’re planning a birthday party, discreet dinner, business meeting, or wedding reception, our formula is simple: every occasion is individually designed to meet and exceed all expectations. Our wide range of restaurant and bar spaces means you’ll easily find the ideal venue for your bespoke event, and our experienced team will be delighted to help you organise and host it with finesse.
To make an enquiry or speak to a member of the Events by Gordon Ramsay team please phone 0207 592 1373,
email us
or
complete the form below
.
View brochure

Groups, Private Dining, and Exclusive Hire
Host your event at Savoy Grill, where exceptional food, fine wines and Champagnes, and a prime Strand location set the stage for a memorable experience.
Choose from group dining in the main restaurant, intimate private dining in the Wine Room, or exclusive hire for large parties and corporate events.
Our expert chefs and front of house team look forward to welcoming you.
Capacities:
Kitchen Table: 6 guests.
Wine Room: 8 guests.
Group Dining: 70 guests.
Exclusive Hire: 100 guests seated or 200 standing.
VIEW MENUS
// Show content //
// Set the previous template variable to this template //
// If not first //
Wine Room
A refined private dining room for up to 8 guests, the Wine Room at Savoy Grill offers an exclusive setting for elegant lunches, intimate dinners, or our Wine Room Experience.
FIND OUT MORE
BOOK NOW
// Show content //
// Set the previous template variable to this template //

FIND OUT MORE

Exclusive Hire
Host an unforgettable event in the iconic Savoy Grill. Perfect for weddings, corporate events, or private celebrations, our venue accommodates up to 100 guests seated or 200 standing.
FIND OUT MORE
ENQUIRE

Kitchen Table
Immerse yourself in an intimate culinary experience at our Kitchen Table, available for up to 6 guests. Enjoy a bespoke menu while witnessing the artistry of our chefs in action.
FIND OUT MORE

Submit a group enquiry using the form below

or call 0207 592 1373
Please note: enquiries via form or email are not confirmed until a team member gets in touch. Online bookings for private dining are confirmed instantly.

We welcome children of all ages at Savoy Grill.

Gordon Ramsay Restaurants

Hell's Kitchen
Book
Venues
Menus
Private Dining
Gift Cards
Experiences
About
Inspired by the global television series, Chef Ramsay’s Hell’s Kitchen restaurants have become a fan-favorite in Las Vegas, serving over 1 million Beef Wellingtons since opening their doors in 2018. Today, Hell's Kitchen serves guests in Las Vegas, Lake Tahoe, Southern California, Atlantic City, Washington D.C., Foxwoods, and now Miami.
View Locations
There is a lot of nostalgia behind this concept of Hell's Kitchen. The restaurant on set is exactly the same as the one we have built here, from the (colors of the) red and blue teams to the banquets to the chef tables. And then there is the food – everyone is desperate to eat those scallops!
Chef Gordon Ramsay
Hell's Kitchen History
Originally a television series, host and Michelin-starred Chef Gordon Ramsay challenged a new group of talented chefs each season splitting them into the iconic red and blue teams in Hell's Kitchen. Facing challenges, dinner service and elimination, these hopeful chefs battle it out in the kitchen with hopes of becoming Chef Ramsay's protege. Nominated for six Emmy awards, Hell's Kitchen is currently in the midst of its 21st season.
Drawing inspiration from the television series, Chef Gordon Ramsay creates a unique dining experience for guests to feel as if they are dining on set at Hell's Kitchen. The menu at Hell's Kitchen includes iconic dishes such as Beef Wellington, Pan-Seared Scallops, Lobster Risotto, Sticky Toffee Pudding and more.
Visit Hell's Kitchen from coast to coast — Southern California, Las Vegas, Lake Tahoe, Atlantic City, Washington D.C., Foxwoods, and now Miami.
View
Locations
Gordon Ramsay
Internationally renowned, multi-Michelin starred Chef Gordon Ramsay has opened a string of successful restaurants across the globe, from the UK and United States to France and Singapore. Gordon is also an international TV star, with shows that include Hell’s Kitchen, MasterChef, MasterChef Junior and Gordon Ramsay’s American Road Trip.
Learn
More

Groups, Events & Private Dining
For an intimate approach to your next dining experience, discover our private dining rooms in London.
Whether you are a couple wishing to dine in privacy, business colleagues holding a meeting to impress clients, hosting a family gathering, or looking for an intimate wedding party, we can help you.
With venues, private rooms and bars across London and other cities, you are sure to find the perfect location, with many offering a number of sophisticated and interactive spaces to entertain within.
To make an enquiry or for any further assistance please contact our Events team by Gordon Ramsay team on
0207 592 1373,
email us at
events@gordonramsay.com
or
submit the form
below.
Explore Our Venues
